abstract: Howard Beck On Basketball column asserts that whenever the lockout is resolved, the NBA will build a new schedule from scratch, using all arena dates that are still reserved.
snippet: Whenever the lockout is resolved, the N.B.A. will build a new schedule from scratch, using all arena dates that are still reserved, according to people who are aware of the league’s plans.
lead_paragraph: Whenever the lockout is resolved, the N.B.A. will build a new schedule from scratch, using all arena dates that are still reserved, according to people who are aware of the league’s plans.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Schedule Is Moot as Arena Dates Are Given Up
